title: cmd/godoc: godoc -url does not work with some urls
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. godoc -url=/ref/spec

What is the expected output?
HTML data for The Go Language Specification

What do you see instead?
HTTP 404 error

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
linux/amd64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +c0761b6a5160 Fri Nov 02 20:46:47 2012 +1100

Please provide any additional information below.
Also affected: /project (404), / and /doc (file list instead of content page), /cmd and
/pkg (missing synopsis) etc.
It appears to be caused by missing filesystem and metadata initialization.
I have a patch (it is quite trivial) but IIUC this is not the place share patches.
Should I submit a CL?
